titles.title: We're A People That Love, Love

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We're a people that love, love, love,
Love one another.
We're a people who care, care, care,
For sisters and brothers.
Through sunshine and rain,
We will love just the same.
We're a people who love, love, love,
Love one another.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Una familia somos una que ama,
Una familia que cuida a sus hermanos,

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Amamos igual en la lluvia O el sol,
Una familia somos una que ama.
